overview: Why did the hen cross the street? Tired of that joke, Bicardo, a hot-blooded hen, decides to start a riot. His friends, Dona Galinda, Frangocisca and Ovaldo, follow him to the outskirts of the farm without noticing. As they become aware theyâ€™re far from home, the hens decide to go back, but now they face a problem: Bacardi is the only one that knows the way. What now? Will they join the riot or will they find another way to return?
title: A Vida Secreta das Galinhas
